observation_text: Lille PTT, relaying, via PTT Paris, the banquet given by the American Legion to the President of the Republic, at the Hotel Continental. Speeches were made by the French President, M. Georges Leygues, French Minister of the Navy, and M. Paul Painlevé, War Minister.
full_text: F. H. Ahen (Lowestoft): Lille PTT, relaying, via PTT Paris, the banquet given by the American Legion to the President of the Republic, at the Hotel Continental. Speeches were made by the French President, M. Georges Leygues, French Minister of the Navy, and M. Paul Painlevé, War Minister.
